授業方法:
THIS COURSE WILL BE CONDUCTED ON ZOOM, BUT WE MAY DO SOME FACE TO FACE CLASSES. Hence, if you cannot attend face to face classes, you should not take this class.

In this course, students will engage in discussion, presentation, pair work and group work tasks in an all English classroom.

第2回: Overview of corpus linguistics, corpus tasks
第7回: Project 1 - teaching materials, introduction to individual research
第9回: Project 2 - corpus building, individual research check
トピック.授業計画1: This course will blend teacher-centered lecture style instruction with student-centered discussion. We will have some presentations and group projects throughout the semester we will work on an academic essay which reports on the use of corpus data to investigate a particular language or vocabulary point. The class outline and pace of the class outlined above may be adjusted in response to student needs. There will be 3-4 academic writing workshops to aid students with their research, the amount and timing of these will be based on student needs.
トピック.授業外学習2: Students will need to spend an average of one to two hours outside of class to prepare for each class. They will be expected to complete all the assigned tasks before each class because they will not be able to participate fully in class if they do not complete their homework.
